description: Move a single instance of a recurring weekly meeting. Tests that only one occurrence is rescheduled, not the entire series.

events.title: Weekly Team Sync
events.reasoning: Alice asked to move tomorrow's weekly team sync from 10 AM to 11:30 AM, just for this week. Same room and agenda. Matches calendar event [1] (tomorrow's instance).
events.assumptions: Duration kept at 1 hour, only this week's instance affected

mock_llm_response.summary: Rescheduled this week's team sync from 10 AM to 11:30 AM.

notes: Reference datetime is Wednesday 2026-02-18, so 'tomorrow' is Thursday 2026-02-19. Calendar has two instances of the recurring event. Only [1] (tomorrow) should be updated; [2] (next week) stays at 10 AM.
